channel.title: DarkClawz ||construction added||nex||Bork||Loyalty titles||drop party room||
channel.description:
Hey guys liamp here with another development yes i'm using the name DarkClawz again right now i dont have much to say :/ [b]base rskills [/b]
[center][img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/darkclawz.png[/img] [/center]
few little Features: Cache Packed 634 Items <--- but not all of them Cache Packed 602 Npc's
Better Woodcutting nex loyalty titles loyalty titles shop + points custom interface flax picking RFD minigame Achievements in game highscores random events added brok added drop party room construction
zombie minigame ([color=black]need to fix some errors then its done)[/color]
Few pictures: [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture080-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture083.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture078.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture065.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture069.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture062.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture055-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture059.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture064.png[/img] [b]this is a picture off brok from old server cba to take a new picture[/b] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture049.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture047.png?t=1328202672[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture076.png[/img]
here is a code tag off are updates [code]15/2/12 found base - voetbal645 picked a name for the server - liamp added clip stop people from walking though walls and doors ect - liamp added / re wrote percent to cureses tells you how much bonus you get off the prayer - voetbal645 added brok - liamp and voetbal645 added boss teleport 2 to spell book - voetbal645 added so brok would be multi - voetbal645 added double xp amulet - voetbal645 improved RFD minigame - liamp added in game highscores - liamp added event folder with all the events in there - liamp added Randomevent - liamp 16/2/1 improved the loyalty titles codes - liamp added new loyalty titles - liamp added loyalty points - voetbal645 added loyalty points shop with custom interface - voetbal645 added loyalty titles to chatbox - Voetbal645 added Achievements - Voetbal645 added flax picking - liamp added total in game played time - liamp 17/2/12 nex has been added - liamp nex animation added - liamp C++ Imbued gave me code for the loyalty title shop -liamp added item to the shop/interfce - liamp added drop party room - Voetbal645 added/found leaver id - liamp ( still need to find chest id )[/code]
Programmers off this server:[b]me and my good mate voetbal645[/b]

item.title: DarkClawz ||construction added||nex||Bork||Loyalty titles||drop party room||
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:28, topic:433188”][quote author=liamp link=topic=535907.msg3918248#msg3918248 date=1329431914]
few little Features:
Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx <— Not cache packed
Cache Packed 634 Items <— Yes, but not all of them
Cache Packed 602 Npc’s <— Yes, it is

[/quote]

I seen your client, This is my version of what i seen.

few little Features:
Better Woodcutting
nex
loyalty titles
loyalty titles shop + points
custom interface
flax picking
RFD minigame
Achievements
in game highscores
random events added
brok

Looks pretty easy. I am giving you support but still try to do something with the core. And next time, please stop working with PI. Good Luck[/quote]

ok thank you for telling me i thought if you had 634 items and 602 npc then you would have all off them cached packaged thanks for telling me

Read full topic

Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx <— Not cache packed
Cache Packed 634 Items <— Yes, but not all of them
Cache Packed 602 Npc’s <— Yes, it is[/quote]

I seen your client, This is my version of what i seen.

[quote=“liamp, post:1, topic:433188”]few little Features:
Better Woodcutting
nex
loyalty titles
loyalty titles shop + points
custom interface
flax picking
RFD minigame
Achievements
in game highscores
random events added
brok[/quote]

Looks pretty easy. I am giving you support but still try to do something with the core. And next time, please stop working with PI. Good Luck

Read full topic

I bet that Is the code I released for calculating bonuses bet it don’t reset upon being deactivated ; anyway I rewrote that

Good Luck.
[/quote]

What? It isn’t hard to make it reset.[/quote]Never said it was? I’ve actually rewritten the curse calculation system completely doesn’t use process at all anymore. ect
